data.title: Visual Effects Society
data.meta_description: The VES holds events and screenings around the world in every VES Section, ranging from the annual Awards Gala to educational and anniversary affairs to pub nights produced by volunteers within the various VES Sections. Many of our screenings include Q&A panels with the visual effects teams who prove that we can create
